description: Create or update knowledge in Langflow.

new_kb_name.info: Name of the new knowledge to create.

embedding_model.info: Select the embedding model to use for this knowledge base.

api_key.info: Provider API key for embedding model

knowledge_base.info: Select the knowledge to load data from.

input_df.info: Table with all original columns (already chunked / processed). Accepts Data or DataFrame. If Data is provided, it is converted to a DataFrame automatically.

column_config.info: Configure column behavior for the knowledge base.

column_name.description: Name of the column in the source DataFrame

identifier.description: Use this column as unique identifier

embedding_api_key.info: API key for the embedding provider to generate embeddings.

allow_duplicates.info: Allow duplicate rows in the knowledge base
